GIS upgrade project

  1. Java Installation - GIS needs a customized patched version of IBM Java. Here is the procedure
    1. Copy the installations files from taitc118
      mkdir -p /var/tmp/javapatches /var/tmp/javainstall/
scp -r taitc118:/prod/images/Java/GISJava/ /var/tmp/javainstall/
scp -r taitc118:/prod/images/Java/GISJava/fixes/  /var/tmp/javapatches/
    2. Install SDK
      /var/tmp/javainstall/Java6_64.sdk
    3. Install SR8FP1 from taitc118
      /var/tmp/javainstall/Java6_64.sdk.6.0.0.215.bff
    4. Apply the Floating Point fix utility tool to address security alert CVE-2010-4476
      /usr/java6_64/bin/java -jar /var/tmp/javapatches/JavaUpdateInstaller.jar -install /var/tmp/javapatches/IZ94423_FIX_1.jar /usr/java6_64
    5. Test the installation
      /usr/java6_64/bin/java -jar /var/tmp/javapatches/ParseDoubleTest.jar
    6. Cleanup the tempfiles
      rm -rf /var/tmp/javapatches /var/tmp/javainstall
